title: Transformations in Learned Image Compression from a Modulation Perspective
abstract: arXiv:2203.02158v3 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: In this paper, a unified transformation method in learned image compression(LIC) is proposed from the perspective of modulation. Firstly, the quantization in LIC is considered as a generalized channel with additive uniform noise. Moreover, the LIC is interpreted as a particular communication system according to the consistency in structures and optimization objectives. Thus, the technology of communication systems can be applied to guide the design of modules in LIC. Furthermore, a unified transform method based on signal modulation (TSM) is defined. In the view of TSM, the existing transformation methods are mathematically reduced to a linear modulation. A series of transformation methods, e.g. TPM and TJM, are obtained by extending to nonlinear modulation. translated_title: 从调制的角度探讨学习图像压缩中的变换
translated_abstract: 本文从调制的角度提出了一种统一的学习图像压缩(LIC)变换方法。首先，将LIC中的量化视为带有加性均匀噪声的广义信道。此外，根据结构和优化目标的一致性，将LIC解释为一种特殊的通信系统。因此，可以应用通信系统技术来指导LIC中模块的设计。此外，定义了一种基于信号调制的统一变换方法（TSM）。从TSM的观点来看，现有的变换方法在数学上被简化为线性调制。通过扩展到非线性调制，可以得到一系列变换方法，如TPM和TJM。在各种数据集和骨干架构上的实验结果验证了该方法的有效性和稳健性。
tldr: 本文提出了一种新的学习图像压缩变换方法，将LIC解释为通信系统，通过引入信号调制的方法，实现了各种变换方法的数学简化和扩展，并在实验中验证了其有效性和稳健性。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a new transformation method for learned image compression, interprets LIC as a communication system, simplifies and extends various transformation methods by introducing signal modulation, and validates its effectiveness and robustness through experiments.
